The length of time a participant has to complete their turn before Game Center passes the turn to the next participant. The maximum value is 90 days.

Invoke this method to forfeit the match when the local player is the current participant. To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the
protocol with the local player. See

abstract.text: Enable players to interact with friends, compare leaderboard ranks, earn achievements, and participate in multiplayer games.
The protocol that handles turn-based and data-exchange events between participants in a match.
An object that encapsulates the match data for games where players take turns.
The state of a participant when they forfeit a match or when a match ends.
Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when itâ€™s their turn.
Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when itâ€™s not their turn.
The players that participate in a turn-based match.
A participant in a turn-based match.
Let Game Center store and forward match data between players in a turn-based game.

doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/Ga.title: Starting turn-based matches and passing turns between players
